name: Symbiosis (itch) (Jacob Vincent)
description:
A game I made during LD38!

A little survival action game. See how long you can keep your small world alive - and the small worlds growing on it. Who knows, they might give you a hand.

A lot of firsts for me here:
- First time doing 'art'
- First solo jam
- First Ludum Dare

Lots of fun, definitely didn't get as much done as I'd hoped and pretty rough around the edges but I did finish with a game!

Controls:

A/D - Move left/right
Space - Jump
Mouse Wheel - Switch between gun & bounce fist
Q/E - Switch between worlds
LMB - Fire
